price: So do not obey the disbelievers, but strive against them with this [Qur’an] a great striving.
arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدۡهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
